about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy a sensual story while completing tricky puzzles!
Connect the numbers sequentially, using all of the squares on the board.
After completing a puzzle, you will unlock a sexy new image and the next part of the story!
Can you complete every puzzle and meet all of the red light girls?!

Story Background

In modern times where sexual services are completely legal, sex workers are regarded as a noble profession.
You are a sex services reporter, and you are about to explore this world full of lust.
Who will you meet there?

Characters

Mai:

Mai is a cat girl sex worker. She has short blonde hair, a petite body, and a cat-like personality.
She likes to act like a spoiled kitty, but is really a cute adorable kitty girl.

Haru:

A sex worker who likes to wear revealing exotic clothes. She has a perfect curvy figure.
She wears a veil on her face to add a sense of mystery. Her coquettish sexual services bring a steady stream of customers.

Muku:

Muku is a cow girl sex worker, she wears cow-patterned underwear and cow ears. Befitting a cowgirl, she has huge breasts and a plump figure.
She offers an "older sister" experience that heals those customers who long for love.

Features

  • 19 sexy and erotic images of beautiful girls.
  • A fantastical erotic story with girls who have unique personalities.
  • You can skip the puzzles if you just want to enjoy the story. (Press Enter during a puzzle.)
  • CG Gallery mode. (Click the left and right buttons next to the CG after completing a puzzle.)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
It contains sexual assault and BDSM.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

  • Storage: 800 MB available space
